name: Dutch Innovation Grant
description: A government grant aimed at supporting innovative startups in various sectors. Provides funding for research and development, product development, and market entry.
eligibility_criteria: Early-stage startups with innovative ideas, registered in the Netherlands, with fewer than 25 employees.
application_process: Online application through the RVO portal, followed by a panel review and interview.

name: Amsterdam Venture Partners Fund
description: A venture capital fund focused on technology startups in the Amsterdam region. Provides Series A funding along with mentorship and network access.
eligibility_criteria: Tech startups with proven traction, preferably based in the Amsterdam region.
application_process: Initial pitch deck submission, followed by several rounds of meetings with partners.

name: Dutch Sustainability Subsidy
description: Government subsidy for eco-friendly initiatives and sustainable business practices. Covers up to The government provides subsidies for sustainability innovations in the Netherlands.
organization: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Climate Policy
eligibility_criteria: Businesses with clear sustainability goals, reduced carbon footprint initiatives, or circular economy models.
application_process: Online submission with detailed project plans and expected environmental impact.

name: Rotterdam Angel Network
description: A network of angel investors based in Rotterdam who invest in early-stage startups. Offers funding as well as mentorship from experienced entrepreneurs.
eligibility_criteria: Early-stage startups with a solid business plan and some proof of concept or initial traction.
application_process: Introduction through network members, followed by pitch at monthly investor meetings.

name: Rabobank Innovation Loan
description: Low-interest loans specifically designed for innovative startups and scale-ups in the Netherlands. Flexible repayment terms adapted to business growth.
eligibility_criteria: Startups with at least 2 years of operation, positive revenue growth, and innovative business model.
application_process: Application through Rabobank business advisors, financial assessment, and business plan review.

name: EU Horizon Innovation Grant
description: European Union grant program for breakthrough innovation projects with high potential impact. Supports international collaboration across EU member states.
eligibility_criteria: Innovative projects with high growth potential, preferably with partners from multiple EU countries.
application_process: Multi-stage application through EU portal, consortium building, detailed project proposal.
